What method was used to measure the BET surface areas of the MOFs?
data.answer: N2 adsorption and desorption isotherms were measured at 77 K.

data.question: Which MOF showed the most significant change in emission upon hydration?
What was the crystal system for Zr-L2?
What was the space group for Hf-L3?
What was the reason for the low N2 uptake observed for Zr-L5?
data.answer: Incomplete activation or partial framework collapse during activation may explain the lower than expected N2 uptake.

data.question: What was the contact angle measured for Zr-L1?
True or False: The thermal stabilities of the Zr and Hf MOFs were significantly affected by the presence of either Zr6 or Hf6 clusters.
What was the effect of water on the fluorescence emission of L1-H2?
data.answer: There was very little effect on the fluorescence emission of L1-H2 under dry and wet conditions.

data.question: True or False: The PXRD pattern of Zr-L2 after being wetted then dried again was significantly different from its original pattern.
What was the method used for activation of the MOFs before gas uptake experiments?
data.answer: The MOFs were activated by drying under vacuum after being left to stand in CHCl3.

data.question: What was the main reason for the structural change observed in Zr-L2?
data.answer: Twisting of two thirds of the ligands within the framework caused by steric interactions.

data.question: True or False: The solid-state photoluminescence spectra of the MOFs were identical under dry and wet conditions.
What was the contact angle of water on Zr-L5, indicating its hydrophobicity?
Which MOF exhibited solvatochromism behavior upon exposure to different solvents?
True or False: The emission behavior of the dimethyl esters of the ligands changed significantly upon wetting.
What was the space group for Zr-L2?
What was the observed effect of varying relative humidity on the emission of Zr-L7?
data.answer: A gradual red shift in emission was observed with increasing relative humidity.

data.question: True or False: The BET surface area of Zr-L1 was higher than that of Zr-L5.
What was the method used to measure the contact angle of water on the MOF surfaces?
data.answer: An Attension-Theta optical tensiometer was used.
